title: Yearly carbon footprint of SecureGPT 4 at AXA (Ruf & Mortas)
description:
In this scenario, we approximate the yearly carbon footprint of SecureGPT 4 based on the Llama 2 model and energy consumption data from Hugging Face.
We assume that 80% of AXA's ETFs use SecureGPT at a rate of 60 requests per working month.
We therefore have 60 (requests) * 12 (months) * 121,354 (ETFs) * 0.8 (%) = 69,899,904
